actions.name: ActivateKeySigningKey
actions.description: Grants permission to activate a key-signing key so that it can be used for signing by DNSSEC

actions.name: AssociateVPCWithHostedZone
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an additional Amazon VPC with a private hosted zone

actions.name: ChangeResourceRecordSets
actions.description: Grants permission to create, update, or delete a record, which contains authoritative DNS information for a specified domain or subdomain name

actions.name: ChangeTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add, edit, or delete tags for a health check or a hosted zone

actions.name: CreateHealthCheck
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new health check, which monitors the health and performance of your web applications, web servers, and other resources

actions.name: CreateHostedZone
actions.description: Grants permission to create a public hosted zone, which you use to specify how the Domain Name System (DNS) routes traffic on the Internet for a domain, such as example.com, and its subdomains

actions.name: CreateKeySigningKey
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new key-signing key associated with a hosted zone

actions.name: CreateQueryLoggingConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to create a configuration for DNS query logging

actions.name: CreateReusableDelegationSet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a delegation set (a group of four name servers) that can be reused by multiple hosted zones

actions.name: CreateTrafficPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create a traffic policy, which you use to create multiple DNS records for one domain name (such as example.com) or one subdomain name (such as www.example.com)

actions.name: CreateTrafficPolicyInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to create records in a specified hosted zone based on the settings in a specified traffic policy version

actions.name: CreateTrafficPolicyVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new version of an existing traffic policy

actions.name: CreateVPCAssociationAuthorization
actions.description: Grants permission to authorize the AWS account that created a specified VPC to submit an AssociateVPCWithHostedZone request, which associates the VPC with a specified hosted zone that was created by a different account

actions.name: DeactivateKeySigningKey
actions.description: Grants permission to deactivate a key-signing key so that it will not be used for signing by DNSSEC

actions.name: DeleteHealthCheck
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a health check

actions.name: DeleteHostedZone
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a hosted zone

actions.name: DeleteKeySigningKey
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a key-signing key

actions.name: DeleteQueryLoggingConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a configuration for DNS query logging

actions.name: DeleteReusableDelegationSet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a reusable delegation set

actions.name: DeleteTrafficPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a traffic policy

actions.name: DeleteTrafficPolicyInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a traffic policy instance and all the records that Route 53 created when you created the instance

actions.name: DeleteVPCAssociationAuthorization
actions.description: Grants permission to remove authorization for associating an Amazon Virtual Private Cloud with a Route 53 private hosted zone

actions.name: DisableHostedZoneDNSSEC
actions.description: Grants permission to disable DNSSEC signing in a specific hosted zone

actions.name: DisassociateVPCFromHostedZone
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate an Amazon Virtual Private Cloud from a Route 53 private hosted zone

actions.name: EnableHostedZoneDNSSEC
actions.description: Grants permission to enable DNSSEC signing in a specific hosted zone

actions.name: GetAccountLimit
actions.description: Grants permission to get the specified limit for the current account, for example, the maximum number of health checks that you can create using the account

actions.name: GetChange
actions.description: Grants permission to get the current status of a request to create, update, or delete one or more records

actions.name: GetCheckerIpRanges
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the IP ranges that are used by Route 53 health checkers to check the health of your resources

actions.name: GetDNSSEC
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about DNSSEC for a specific hosted zone, including the key-signing keys in the hosted zone

actions.name: GetGeoLocation
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about whether a specified geographic location is supported for Route 53 geolocation records

actions.name: GetHealthCheck
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a specified health check

actions.name: GetHealthCheckCount
actions.description: Grants permission to get the number of health checks that are associated with the current AWS account

actions.name: GetHealthCheckLastFailureReason
actions.description: Grants permission to get the reason that a specified health check failed most recently

actions.name: GetHealthCheckStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to get the status of a specified health check

actions.name: GetHostedZone
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a specified hosted zone including the four name servers that Route 53 assigned to the hosted zone

actions.name: GetHostedZoneCount
actions.description: Grants permission to get the number of hosted zones that are associated with the current AWS account

actions.name: GetHostedZoneLimit
actions.description: Grants permission to get the specified limit for a specified hosted zone

actions.name: GetQueryLoggingConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a specified configuration for DNS query logging

actions.name: GetReusableDelegationSet
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a specified reusable delegation set, including the four name servers that are assigned to the delegation set

actions.name: GetReusableDelegationSetLimit
actions.description: Grants permission to get the maximum number of hosted zones that you can associate with the specified reusable delegation set

actions.name: GetTrafficPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a specified traffic policy version

actions.name: GetTrafficPolicyInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a specified traffic policy instance

actions.name: GetTrafficPolicyInstanceCount
actions.description: Grants permission to get the number of traffic policy instances that are associated with the current AWS account

actions.name: ListGeoLocations
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of geographic locations that Route 53 supports for geolocation

actions.name: ListHealthChecks
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the health checks that are associated with the current AWS account

actions.name: ListHostedZones
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the public and private hosted zones that are associated with the current AWS account

actions.name: ListHostedZonesByName
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of your hosted zones in lexicographic order. Hosted zones are sorted by name with the labels reversed, for example, com.example.www

actions.name: ListHostedZonesByVPC
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all the private hosted zones that a specified VPC is associated with

actions.name: ListQueryLoggingConfigs
actions.description: Grants permission to list the configurations for DNS query logging that are associated with the current AWS account or the configuration that is associated with a specified hosted zone

actions.name: ListResourceRecordSets
actions.description: Grants permission to list the records in a specified hosted zone

actions.name: ListReusableDelegationSets
actions.description: Grants permission to list the reusable delegation sets that are associated with the current AWS account.

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for one health check or hosted zone

actions.name: ListTagsForResources
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for up to 10 health checks or hosted zones

actions.name: ListTrafficPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the latest version for every traffic policy that is associated with the current AWS account. Policies are listed in the order in which they were created

actions.name: ListTrafficPolicyInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the traffic policy instances that you created by using the current AWS account

actions.name: ListTrafficPolicyInstancesByHostedZone
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the traffic policy instances that you created in a specified hosted zone

actions.name: ListTrafficPolicyInstancesByPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the traffic policy instances that you created using a specified traffic policy version

actions.name: ListTrafficPolicyVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all the versions for a specified traffic policy

actions.name: ListVPCAssociationAuthorizations
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the VPCs that were created by other accounts and that can be associated with a specified hosted zone

actions.name: TestDNSAnswer
actions.description: Grants permission to get the value that Route 53 returns in response to a DNS query for a specified record name and type

actions.name: UpdateHealthCheck
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing health check

actions.name: UpdateHostedZoneComment
actions.description: Grants permission to update the comment for a specified hosted zone

actions.name: UpdateTrafficPolicyComment
actions.description: Grants permission to update the comment for a specified traffic policy version

actions.name: UpdateTrafficPolicyInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to update the records in a specified hosted zone that were created based on the settings in a specified traffic policy version
